name: Ion Blaster
description: Ion Blaster is a project created for a course at North Carolina State University in Spring 2021, for the FEDD Project Educational Computer Game category. The game was intended to teach students about chemistry and polyatomic ions, and the objective is to combine ions of opposite charges to clear them from the game. This project was created by Duncan Glynn, Natasha Benson, Landon Gaddy, and Janet Green, and it was created using GameMaker Lite.
